name: Bounce U
description:
In Bounce U you will guide your character through a stunningly beautiful yet hard world.

Battle against your friends for the high score in this never ending game, break green lines for points, it sounds simple but is it? Bounce U will push your logical and physical abilities to the limit.

Simply touch the left side or right side of the screen to move your character and break green lines for points, but avoid the red balls.

◉ Insanely simple to play yet very addictive
◉ Endless gameplay that never gets boring
◉ Find power-ups to reach new high scores
◉ Slow down and speed up your movement!
◉ Grab invincibility power-ups to take down enemies
◉ Beat high scores with gamecenter support
